description:
Leakage control system based on Regulation (EC) No 842/2006.

Leaklog is a leakage control system based on Regulation (EC) No 2024/573. It logs findings and parameters of leakage checks, shows a history of the development of parameters, compares them with nominal ones and calculates the percentage of leakage.
- Added refrigerant R1270
- Added notes to Inspections view (when enabled in the View menu)
- Inspector phone number and email address now used on labels if available
- Fixed import of circuits, repairs, refrigerant management, and inspectors
- Fixed recycled and recovered refrigerant addition not counted in Operator Report
